data.name: CLArtistDetailsMessage_DACS
data.value: We represent this artist for Copyright Licensing. Please fill in our online form to request permission to reproduce their work.

data.name: CLArtistDetailsMessage_NOT_DACS
data.value: Sorry, we do not hold information on who represents this artist for Copyright Licensing.

data.name: DefaultCategory
data.value: Latest News

data.name: ImageHireDetail1DetailPage
data.value: Browse and request image high quality, approved images through our Artimage website.

data.name: ImageHireHeaderDetailPage
data.value: <dt class="icon-tick first-child last-child">Images are available on Artimage</dt>

data.name: ImageHireMessage_1
data.value: <dt class="icon-tick first-child">Images by this artist are available from Artimage</dt>

data.name: ImageHireMessage_Pre
data.value: Images by this artist are available from DACS. Please contact licensing@dacs.org.uk for more information.

data.name: MandateMessage_1
data.value: Verified by DACS as eligible for ARR Royalties

data.name: MandateMessage_2
data.value: DACS has not confirmed this artists nationality.

data.name: MandateMessage_22
data.value: DACS has not confirmed this artists nationality but will do so on request.

data.name: MandateMessage_3
data.value: DACS does not hold copyright or nationality status information for this artist.

data.name: MoreInfoMessage_1
data.value: Full consultation means that all license requests need to be reviewed and signed-off by the artist or their estate. This can be time consuming.

data.name: MoreInfoMessage_2
data.value: You may need to supply imagery depicting their work in context (e.g. a PDF).

data.name: MoreInfoMessage_3
data.value: "There may be restrictions on certain uses of this artist's work. Please get in touch, and we'll be happy to advise you."

data.name: MoreInfoMessage_4
data.value: Sorry, we do not hold information on who represents this artist for Copyright Licensing.

data.name: MoreInfoMessage_5
data.value: Sorry, we do not hold information on which organisation represents this artist. DACS does not hold information about the copyright status of this artist. If you would like to help us update our database, please get in touch.

data.name: MoreInfoMessage_6
data.value: As their date of death is over seventy years ago, this artist is likely out of copyright. Photographs of this artists work may still be in copyright: please check with your image supplier.

data.name: PaymentMessage_1
data.value: This artist has mandated DACS to represent them for ARR.

data.name: PaymentMessage_2
data.value: DACS is acting as the collecting agency through a Sister Society

data.name: PaymentMessage_3
data.value: Represented for ARR by

data.name: PaymentMessage_4
data.value: DACS pays royalties to this artist

data.name: PaymentMessage_5
data.value: DACS is acting as the collecting agency through a Sister Society. Please contact us for more information on the nationality status of this artist.

data.name: RepresentationMessage_1
data.value: <dt class="icon-tick first-child">DACS represents this artist for Copyright Licensing</dt>

data.name: RepresentationMessage_2
data.value: <dt class="icon-cross first-child last-child"> DACS does not represent this artist for Copyright Licensing</dt>

data.name: ServiceDurationMessage_1
data.value: Your licence request will take roughly 1-2 weeks

data.name: ServiceDurationMessage_2
data.value: Full consultation is required for this artist: your license request may take more than 2 weeks

data.name: WarnningMessage_1
data.value: Warning: these search results are not exhaustive. You still need to pay ARR if the artist is a national from the European Economic Area, and if deceased, they have a date of death within 70 years of the sale date. View a list of eligible countries.
